conversation.speaker: SYSTEM
conversation.text: Based on your preference for Japanese genre and interest in a deeper story, I recommend watching 'Man on Wire' (2008). It's a captivating documentary about Philippe Petit's high-wire stunt between the World Trade Center towers in 1974. The film explores not only the physical accomplishment but also the emotional and psychological aspects of the event.

While not directly featuring Coben as an actor, the movie has a strong connection to his work due to its sci-fi themes and exploration of morality. The cast includes several well-known actors such as Russell Crowe and Michael Shannon, who add depth to the story.
